entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of snow in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
